briefTitle: Survey of Optical Values of the Breast Using Radiation-Free Pressure-Free Optical Scanning
officialTitle: Early Screening of Breast Cancer Using Radiation-Free Pressure-Free Optical Scanning
conditions: Breast Lesions, Breast Cyst, Early-Stage Breast Cancer, Benign Growth, Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Optical normals for the breast for a variety of conditions
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* You must be female
* You must be 21 to 50 years old
* You must not have or have had breast cancer.
* You must not have or have had breast implants or breast surgery
* You must not have had a breast biopsy or injury, or a breast infection, in 90 days.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any one or more of the above conditions not met
* Lack of informed consent
